Aug. 27, 1932 D Peebles Contest
Peebles Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
peebles-contest-1
None
Hay Lodge Park, Peebles March contest - 1st Hawick, 2nd Sel;kirk, 3rd Gala, 4th Gorebridge, 5th Peebles. First contest of the newly formed Midlothian and Border Brass Band Association. 5 bands competed.
Jan. 12, 2014, 10:39 p.m. April 4, 2018, 6:40 a.m.
1 Hawick Saxhorn Band George Guy
2 Galashiels Town James Amos
3 Selkirk Silver Tom Young
Unknown Result Gorebridge and Arniston Gregor Grant
Unknown Result Peebles Burgh Silver William Grant
